snippet.title: Inkwellers Trailer 01
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3061390/Inkwellers/

Get a sneak peek at Inkwellers – our two-player co-op game packed with puzzles, mystery, and a dark atmosphere. In Inkwellers, you and a friend become “Inkwellers,” diving into ancient journals to uncover the story of Celiphia, a lost demi-goddess with a past full of secrets. This is all about teamwork, communication, and clever thinking to make it through the challenges!

So what’s inside?
    Puzzles that take true co-op to solve 🤝
    An abandoned sanctum with a mystical, haunting vibe 🕯️
    Story snippets filled with betrayal, redemption, and big reveals 📖

This is just a small taste of what’s to come – thanks for checking it out! Drop us a comment with your thoughts, and tell us what you’d love to see next.

And hey, hit subscribe to stay in the loop as we bring #Inkwellers to life!

#indiedev #indiegame #gamedev #game #puzzlegame #inkwellers
